Articles.Content:
Hello, I'm looking for a mod that adds shells to make my rockets look nice (like real rockets...) and more aerodynamic. Basically just nice aerodynamic cases for my rockets. I know I've seen a really good one in one of Scott Manley's videos but I can't find it, and looking on Space Port/forum search has proved fruitless.

Please help!

The "mod" your thinking of mentioned on one of Scott Manley's videos is the Fairing Factory which is a webpage. Link here: http://nathannifong.com/FairingFactory/

Alternatively The KW rocketry mod has selection of fairings in addition to the included rockets.

The "mod" your thinking of mentioned on one of Scott Manley's videos is the Fairing Factory which is a webpage. Link here: http://nathannifong.com/FairingFactory/

Alternatively The KW rocketry mod has selection of fairings in addition to the included rockets.

Fairing Factory would be my suggestion if you want something customizable.

Some of the mod packs also have fairings. Either KW Rocketry or NovaPunch does, maybe both. One of the SpaceX falcon mods has fairings, as does the CORE rocketry mod.
